alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:51PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yakima County through 215 PM PDT... At 151 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northern Yakama Reservation, or 15 miles southwest of Yakima, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yakima, Tampico, Wiley City and Ahtanum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Yakima Valley
